entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is described as gruffly speaking to Harry. He is brushing soot off Harry.

entities.name: knockturn alley
entities.description: Knockturn Alley is a dodgy place where Hagrid does not want Harry to be seen.

relationships.description: Hagrid warns Harry against going to Knockturn Alley, describing it as a dodgy place.
